title.rendered: FREE Gift Card & Toys + FREE Berenstain Book + New Toys

content.rendered:
Gift Card Promotion

NOW through Christmas Eve, receive a FREE $10 gift card for every $25 gift card you buy. Gift cards redeemable after 12/25/2017; limit of 10 free cards. Gift cards spend like cash. Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

Toy Sale: Buy 3 get 1 FREE

Load up on gifts that are sure to amaze with our Buy 3, Get 1 Free sale! This promo includes ALL toy lines. Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

Free Book Giveaway

Stop by our Macon and Warner Robins stores on December 16th and receive a FREE copy of The Berenstain Bears: The Very First Christmas when you mention this giveaway. Limit one per family while supplies last.

 

New Toys

No matter what age you are, play is the ideal way to exercise the mind, inspire the imagination, and spark new ways of thinking and solving problems. Fat Brain Toys do just that! Stop by our stores to check out our new inventory. ALL toys are Buy 3 Get 1 FREE until Christmas.

 

Elf on the Shelf

Keep the Elf on the Shelf tradition alive in your homes this Christmas season. Buy this brand NEW set that includes the classic picture book and your very own Elf! It’s only $19.97 (MSRP $30+).
